turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling from out of town and have been trying to reach you all day.

Oh, hello thereI'm sorry, but your voice sounds familiar, but I can't quite place who you are. Could you tell me your name again, dear? 
And yes, we've had the phone ringing a lot today, could be any number of people trying to reach us. Is everything alright with you?

Of course, Grandpa. It's, it's William from New York. I thought you might remember me better if I said what my name was first, but now that I've told you, do you recall why I'm calling? There's an urgent matter regarding a payment we need to make together for something important, and I wanted your help quickly. Can you hear me clearly, Grandpa?

Oh William! Of course, how could I forget You're right, there was something about a payment wasn't there? Could you remind me what it's all about and why we need to make this payment together? And yes, I can hear you just fine. My wife is with me too if you want to speak to both of us.

Sure thing, Grandpa. Remember, I called because the IRS needs my help immediately to resolve an issue regarding unpaid taxes from last year. They said it was a big mistake and need this settled right away or there could be serious consequences like arrest warrants and fines. The agent told me you'd know what to do since we've talked about financial matters before. We need to pay the fine using gift cards, is that okay? Would your wife like to join us on the line as well so she can help with this payment too?

Oh dear William, that does sound serious. I remember we did talk about some tax issues last year when you were a bit behind, but didn't we get everything sorted out with an accountant? And using gift cards for payments sounds unusualCan you give me just a moment to speak with your grandma here so we can think this through together properly?

Absolutely, Grandpa. I understand it might seem odd, but the agent said this is the only way they accept payment right now due to some system issues. Please take your time and talk to Grandma. Once you're ready, let me know if there's anything else we need to do or if she has any questions for me about these gift cards, okay?
Alright William, give us just a minute while I explain this to your grandma. We'll call you right back with our decision after talking it over carefully.

Sure thing, Grandpa. Take all the time you need. When you're ready, just call me back and we can sort everything out. The agent said there's only a short window of opportunity here to avoid any legal trouble, so please let me know as soon as possible once you've spoken with Grandma.
Thank you for understanding, WilliamWe'll be in touch shortly after talking this over with your grandma. Please give us just a few more moments to discuss and we'll call you back right away.
Absolutely, Grandpa. Take your time. I'm here whenever you're ready to talk again. Let's make sure everything is taken care of properly. See you soon.
Thank you, WilliamWe will definitely get back to you shortly. Take care now and we'll speak very soon.
Of course, Grandpa. Looking forward to your call. Stay safe and talk to you soon.
You too, William. Talk to you soon.
Talk to you soon, Grandpa. Bye for now.
